SYN_PT_3_2:
OPERATIVE REPORT: Endobronchial ultrasound-guided transbronchial needle aspiration.
The mediastinum and hila were systematically surveyed. A 7mm lymph node at station 11L was sampled, yielding benign lymphocytes. The scope was then advanced to the left lower lobe, where a 31.5mm mass abutting the airway was id[REDACTED]. Fine needle aspiration of the mass confirmed malignancy on rapid on-site evaluation.
